title: The Energetic Week of Peggy Mitchell: Dance of Faith
summary: Peggy Mitchell discovers her supernatural abilities through prayer and dance, using them to protect her city from impending doom.
summaryGerman: Peggy Mitchell entdeckt ihre übernatürlichen Fähigkeiten durch Gebet und Tanz und nutzt sie, um ihre Stadt vor dem drohenden Untergang zu schützen.
summaryDutch: Peggy Mitchell ontdekt haar bovennatuurlijke vaardigheden door gebed en dans, en gebruikt ze om haar stad te beschermen tegen naderend onheil.
summaryFrench: Peggy Mitchell découvre ses capacités surnaturelles à travers la prière et la danse, les utilisant pour protéger sa ville d'une catastrophe imminente.

story.text: Peggy Mitchell starts her week with a morning prayer, feeling an unusual surge of energy. Later, while dancing at a local studio, she notices her movements seem to manipulate the lights in the room.
Intrigued by recent events, Peggy spends her evening praying for understanding. That night, she dreams of a glowing figure giving her the power to control light.
Energized by the dream, Peggy tests her new abilities, discovering she can not only manipulate light but also amplify energy, filling her with an overwhelming sense of joy.
Peggy decides to use her powers for good. She stops a robbery in progress by blinding the thieves with a sudden flash of light, then leading the victims to safety with illuminating pathways.
Returning to prayer, Peggy asks for guidance on how best to use her gifts. She feels a connection with the people of her city, vowing to protect them.
A sudden storm blackouts the city. Peggy uses her light-manipulating abilities to guide emergency services through the darkness, saving many lives and restoring hope.
As a day of rest, Peggy reflects on her newfound role and dances at her church, her movements a silent prayer of gratitude.

ending: Thus, Peggy Mitchell danced and prayed her way into the hearts of her city's people, a truly illuminated guardian.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility to harness and use it to illuminate the lives of others.
